pages.text: 24|1|ye ek soorah hai, jise hamane utaara tatha anivaary kiya hai aur utaaree hain isamen bahut-see khulee aayaten (nishaaniyaan), taaki tum shiksha grahan karo.

24|2|vyabhichaarinee tatha[1] vyabhichaaree, donon mein se pratyek ko sau kode maaro aur tumhen un donon par koee taras na aaye allaah ke dharm ke vishay[2] mein, yadi tum allaah tatha antim din par eemaan (vishvaas) rakhate ho aur chaahie ki unake dand ke samay upasthit rahe eemaan vaalon ka ek[3] giroh.

24|3|vyabhichaaree[1] nahin vivaah karata, parantu vyabhichaarinee athava mishranavaadee se aur vyabhichaarinee nahin vivaah karatee, parantu vyabhichaaree athava mishranavaadee se aur ise haî€¼raam (avaidh) kar diya gaya hai eemaan vaalon par.

24|4|tatha jo aarop[1] lagaayen vyabhichaar ka satavantee striyon par, phir na laayen chaar saakshee, to unhen assee kode maaro aur na sveekaar karo unaka saakshy kabhee bhee aur ve svayan avagyaakaaree hain.
24|5|parantu jinhonne kshama maang lee isake pashchaat tatha apana sudhaar kar liya, to nihsandeh allaah ati kshamee dayaavaan[1] hai.
24|6|aur jo vyabhichaar ka aarop lagaayen apanee patniyon par aur unake saakshee na hon,[1] parantu ve svayan, to chaar saakshy allaah kee shapath lekar dena hai ki vaastav mein vah sachcha hai[2].
24|7|aur paanchaveen baar ye (kahe) ki usapar allaah kee dhikkaar hai, yadi vah jhootha hai.
24|8|aur stree se dand[1] is prakaar door hoga ki vah chaar baar saakshy de, allaah kee shapath lekar ki nihsandeh, vah (pati) mithyaavaadiyon mein se hai.
24|9|aur paanchaveen baar ye (kahe) ki usapar allaah kee dhikkaar ho, yadi vah sachcha[1] ho.
24|10|aur yadi tumapar allaah ka anugrah aur daya na hotee aur ye ki allaah ati kshamee tatvagy hai, (to samasya badh jaatee).
